```{block string-prompt}
Consider the `fruit` dataset. Use `str_subset()` to create a vector containing only the fruits with a space in their names.
```

```{r string-setup}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r string, exercise = TRUE}

```

```{r string-solution}
str_subset(fruit, " ")
```

```{r string-check}
grade_this_vector()
```

```{r string-wrong-which}
# "class" problem
str_which(fruit, " ")
```

```{r string-wrong-extract}
# "values" problem
str_extract(fruit, " ")
```

```{r string-wrong-subset}
# "length" problem
str_subset(fruit, "\\b")
```
